description: Complications arise after Mizuki and Shouko interrupt Akihisa`s card game. Later, during a test of the Avatar system, the summoners of Class F are embarrassed to find their innermost thoughts revealed.

titles.title: Boku to Honne to Otoko no Songen!
Eu, O Motivo Real E A Dignidade De Um Homem!
Me, True Colors and a Man`s Dignity!
僕と本音と男の尊厳っ!
